comment: The derivative of a function on ` S ` is zero iff it is a constant function. Roughly a biconditional ` S ` analogue of ~ dvconst and ~ dveq0 . Corresponds to integration formula " ` S. 0 _d x = C ` " in section 4.1 of [LarsonHostetlerEdwards] p. 278. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 11-Nov-2015.)
